text: Iye adauzidwa kuti, “Lowa mnyumba yachifumu.” Ndipo pamene iye anaiona iyo, adaganiza kuti ndi dziwe la madzi ndipo miyendo yake adaionetsa poyera. Solomoni adati, “Iyi ndi nyumba yachifumu yomatidwa ndi magalasi.” Iye adati, “Ambuye, ine ndalakwira mzimu wanga. Tsopano ndili kudzipereka pamodzi ndi Solomoni kwa Mulungu, Ambuye wazolengedwa zonse.”
